Fall in Love 5K 2013

Thanks everyone for a fine race! Results are up: awards and results for all runners.

Saturday, September 21, 2013 – 9:00 AM start
On the historic C&O Canal towpath
Start and finish at Fletcher’s Cove – 4940 Canal Road, Washington DC
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/fallinlove5k/

To benefit Special Love, a Virginia-based community of support for children with cancer and their families.

Registration

$20 by July 11, $25 by August 18, $30 by September 18, $40 at either Packet Pickup Evening.

Register online.

Limited to the first 300 entrants – registration includes a high-quality technical running shirt
NO guarantees you will receive a shirt, unless you sign up by end of August.

Packet Pickup

Thursday, September 19 – 5:00-8:00 PM, at Potomac River Running Store
4501 North Fairfax Drive, Arlington VA – (703-243-2332)

Friday, September 20 - 5:00-8:00 PM, at Potomac River Running Store 
3513 Connecticut Avenue, NW – Washington, DC (202-244-3544)

Saturday, September 21 - BEFORE 8 am please. (Race Site)

Course

Out'n'back on the C&O Canal Towpath – no road crossings, completely flat and shaded
Results by Safety and Health Foundation.

Awards

Top 3 overall M/F, top 3 in age groups 19&under, 20-29, 30-39, 40-49, 50-59, 60-69, 70+
Gift Certificates from Potomac River Running Store

Directions

Fletcher's Boat House is located 2 miles North of Key Bridge and 1 mile South of Chain Bridge, at the intersection of Reservoir Road and Canal Road.  You will know you have reached the entrance to Fletcher's when you see the Abner Cloud House, an old stone building, which is adjacent to the canal. 

From Georgetown, head West on M Street, Cross Foxhill Road, M Street becomes Canal Road. Continue west 1.5 miles on Canal Road to the sign for Fletcher’s Cove on the left. CAREFULLY cross the westbound lane to turn into the driveway. Stay right and follow the tunnel under the C&O Canal to free parking. Alternatively, turn right onto Reservoir Road and park free on any neighborhood street.

From VA 495 Beltway:  take exit 41 (Carderock).  Travel east towards the city. This will be the Clara Barton Pkwy.  The pkwy will change names to Canal Rd.  Go through intersection at Chain Bridge.  Go through intersection at Arizona Bridge.   Fletchers Boathouse will be the next right turn.  Because of the angle of the entrance, it is better to turn left onto Reservoir Rd, which is directly across from the Fletchers entrance. Travel 1 block and make a U-turn.  Cross over Canal Rd. into the entrance at Fletchers. We will meet in the lower parking lot, which is through the tunnel.

From MD 495 Beltway: take exit 40 Cabin John Parkway toward DC.  Travel east towards the city. Then take the Clara Barton Parkway towards DC.  The parkway will change names to Canal Rd.  Go through intersection at Chain Bridge.  Go through intersection at Arizona Bridge.   Fletchers Boathouse will be the next right turn. Because of the angle of the entrance, it is better to turn left onto Reservoir Rd, which is directly across from the Fletchers entrance. Travel 1 block and make a U-turn.  Cross over Canal Rd. into the entrance at Fletchers. Use caution driving through one way tunnel to lower parking lot.

From 66 East, take the Rosslyn exit to Key Bridge.  Take a left onto Canal Road after crossing over Key Bridge.  Bear left at Foxhall to stay on Canal Road, and continue onward until the entrance of Fletcher's at Canal and Reservoir.
